PRIVACY POLICY for GIF Finder app
-------------------------------------------


The "app" shall refer to "GIF Finder" app on the Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kk.android.fuzzy_waddle

The app does not collect any personally identifiable information or data from its users in any way, shape, or form.

The app does not require user to login.

The app usage is strictly and purely anonymous use only.

The app does not target nor is designed for minors.
